SELECT /* com.at.apcss.pd.bsm.mapper.PrdcrCrclOgnMngMapper.selectPrdcrCrclOgnMng */ (CASE WHEN CM.APO_CD IS NULL THEN (SELECT OGNZ_CD FROM (SELECT OGNZ_CD FROM TB_APC_OGNZ_INFO WHERE BRNO = CM.BRNO GROUP BY OGNZ_CD ORDER BY OGNZ_CD DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) ELSE CM.APO_CD END) AS APO_CD , CM.APO_NM , CM.APO_SE , CM.APRV , CM.BRNO , CM.CORP_NM , CM.CORP_SE_CD , CM.CORP_DTL_SE_CD , CM.NONGHYUP_CD , CM.CORP_FNDN_DAY , CM.CMPTN_INST , CM.CTPV , CM.SGG , CM.ZIP , CM.LOTNO_ADDR , CM.LOTNO_DTL_ADDR , CM.ROAD_NM_ADDR , CM.ROAD_NM_DTL_ADDR , CM.RPRSV_FLNM , CM.RPRSV_TELNO , CM.RPRSV_MOBLNO , CM.RPRSV_EML , CM.PIC_POSITION , CM.PIC_FLNM , CM.PIC_TELNO , CM.PIC_MOBLNO , CM.PIC_EML , CM.FXNO , CM.INVST_NOPE , CM.INVST_EXPND_FRMER_NOPE , CM.INVST_AMT , CM.FRMER_INVST_AMT , CM.RMRK , CM.PRDCR_GRP_INVST_AMT , CM.LOCGOV_INVST_AMT , CM.ETC_INVST_AMT , CM.MNGMST_INFO_ID , CM.MNGMST_YN , CM.CRNO , CM.ISO_HLD_YN , CM.UO_BRNO , CM.RGLLBR_NOPE , CM.DW_NOPE , CM.DLBRR_NOPE , CM.ITEM_NH_BROF_YN
, CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID) AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_NM , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID
, CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID) AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_NM , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_EV_APO CM WHERE 1=1
AND CM.CMPTN_INST LIKE #{cmptnInst} || '%'
AND CM.II_CODE LIKE '%' || #{ctpv} || '%'
AND CM.SGG LIKE '%' || #{sgg} || '%'
AND CM.CORP_SE_CD LIKE #{corpSeCd} || '%'
AND CM.CORP_DTL_SE_CD LIKE '%' || #{corpDtlSeCd} || '%'
AND CM.BRNO LIKE #{brno} || '%'
AND CM.CORP_NM LIKE '%' || #{corpNm} || '%'
AND CM.APO_SE LIKE '%' || #{apoSe} || '%'
ORDER BY CM.APO_CD ASC

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_SEQ , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT , pt0.* FROM (
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.pd.bsm.mapper.PrdcrCrclOgnMngMapper.selectPrdcrCrclOgnMngList */ (CASE WHEN CM.APO_CD IS NULL THEN (SELECT OGNZ_CD FROM (SELECT OGNZ_CD FROM TB_APC_OGNZ_INFO WHERE BRNO = CM.BRNO GROUP BY OGNZ_CD ORDER BY OGNZ_CD DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) ELSE CM.APO_CD END) AS APO_CD , CM.APO_NM , CM.APO_SE , CM.APRV , CM.BRNO , CM.CORP_NM , CM.CORP_SE_CD , CM.CORP_DTL_SE_CD , CM.NONGHYUP_CD , CM.CORP_FNDN_DAY , CM.CMPTN_INST , CM.CTPV , CM.SGG , CM.ZIP , CM.LOTNO_ADDR , CM.LOTNO_DTL_ADDR , CM.ROAD_NM_ADDR , CM.ROAD_NM_DTL_ADDR , CM.RPRSV_FLNM , CM.RPRSV_TELNO , CM.RPRSV_MOBLNO , CM.RPRSV_EML , CM.PIC_POSITION , CM.PIC_FLNM , CM.PIC_TELNO , CM.PIC_MOBLNO , CM.PIC_EML , CM.FXNO , CM.INVST_NOPE , CM.INVST_EXPND_FRMER_NOPE , CM.INVST_AMT , CM.FRMER_INVST_AMT , CM.RMRK , CM.PRDCR_GRP_INVST_AMT , CM.LOCGOV_INVST_AMT , CM.ETC_INVST_AMT , CM.MNGMST_INFO_ID , CM.MNGMST_YN , CM.CRNO , CM.ISO_HLD_YN , CM.UO_BRNO , CM.RGLLBR_NOPE , CM.DW_NOPE , CM.DLBRR_NOPE , CM.ITEM_NH_BROF_YN
, CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID) AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_NM , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID
, CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID) AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_NM , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_EV_APO CM WHERE 1=1
AND CM.CMPTN_INST LIKE #{cmptnInst} || '%'
AND CM.II_CODE LIKE '%' || #{ctpv} || '%'
AND CM.SGG LIKE '%' || #{sgg} || '%'
AND CM.CORP_SE_CD LIKE #{corpSeCd} || '%'
AND CM.CORP_DTL_SE_CD LIKE '%' || #{corpDtlSeCd} || '%'
AND CM.BRNO LIKE #{brno} || '%'
AND CM.CORP_NM LIKE '%' || #{corpNm} || '%'
AND CM.APO_SE LIKE '%' || #{apoSe} || '%'
ORDER BY CM.APO_CD ASC
) pt0 OFFSET (#{currentPageNo} - 1) * #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{recordCountPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.pd.bsm.mapper.PrdcrCrclOgnMngMapper.selectUo */ CM.UO_APO_CD , CM.UO_APO_SE , CM.UO_BRNO , CM.UO_CORP_NM , CM.UO_CRNO , CM.ISO_APO_CD , CM.ISO_APO_SE , CM.ISO_BRNO , CM.ISO_CORP_NM , CM.ISO_CRNO , CM.DEL_YN
, CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_FRST_INPT_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_ID) AS SYS_FRST_INPT_USER_NM , CM.SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_FRST_INPT_PRGRM_ID
, CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID) AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_NM , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_EV_APO_UO_CD CM WHERE 1=1

SELECT /* com.at.apcss.pd.bsm.mapper.PrdcrCrclOgnMngMapper.selectUoList */ CM.UO_APO_CD , CM.UO_APO_SE , CM.UO_BRNO , CM.UO_CORP_NM , CM.UO_CRNO , CM.ISO_APO_CD , CM.ISO_APO_SE , CM.ISO_BRNO , CM.ISO_CORP_NM , CM.ISO_CRNO , CM.DEL_YN

, CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT , TO_CHAR(CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SYS_LAST_CHG_DT_YMD , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID , (SELECT USER_NM FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_ID) AS SYS_LAST_CHG_USER_NM , CM.SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID AS SYS_LAST_CHG_PRGRM_ID FROM TB_EV_APO_UO_CD CM WHERE 1=1
AND CM.ISO_BRNO = #{brno}
